meanings.definition: To be made up or composed of
meanings.sent1: The cake was consisting of layers of chocolate and vanilla.
meanings.sent2: The team was consisting of players from different schools.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle was consisting of pieces that seemed to disappear when you looked away.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were consisting of a whirlwind of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The forest was consisting of trees so tall they touched the sky.

meanings.definition: To have as parts or members
meanings.sent1: The necklace was consisting of pearls and a silver chain.
meanings.sent2: The committee was consisting of representatives from various departments.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich was consisting of ingredients that danced on the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His argument was consisting of strong evidence that left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra was consisting of musicians whose harmony filled the room.
